task_description:
# Internationalization (English + Spanish)

Full UI translation to Spanish as first additional language. Includes dashboard, CLI help text, documentation, and email templates.

## Rationale
Listed in known gaps. Expands addressable market to Latin America and Spain. Spanish is the second most spoken language by native speakers. Relatively low effort for market expansion.

## User Stories
- As a Spanish-speaking developer, I want to use the platform in my native language so that I can work more efficiently
- As a university in Latin America, I want Spanish documentation so that students can learn easily

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All UI strings externalized and translated
- [ ] Language selector in user preferences
- [ ] CLI supports --language flag
- [ ] Documentation available in Spanish
- [ ] Email templates in user's preferred language
